name: Total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures received as a subrecipient, by highest degree granted and institutional control: FY 2021
description: Total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures received as a subrecipient, by highest degree granted and institutional control: FY 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_r_d_expenditures_and_type_of_institution_b
variableMeasured.description: R&D expenditures and type of institution hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_expenditures_received_as_a_subrecipient_total
variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures Received As A Subrecipient Total

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_expenditures_received_as_a_subrecipient_from_higher_education_pass_through_entities
variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures Received As A Subrecipient From Higher Education Pass Through Entities

variableMeasured.description: R D Expenditures Received As A Subrecipient From Other Pass Through Entities

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: This table includes only institutions reporting $1 million or more in total R&D expenditures in 2020. Institutions reporting less than $1 million in total R&D expenditures in 2020 completed a shorter version of the survey form in FY 2021, and that form only requested R&D expenditures received from higher education institutions. For a listing of R&D expenditures received from higher education institutions at institutions completing the shorter version of the survey, see table 85.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey, FY 2021.
